"Of course, you want to make an impact early on when the ball does something," he said after Mumbai won a thriller against Punjab in the last over by nine runs.

articles.author: TOI City Desk
articles.title: Tamil Nadu couple's unique CSK-themed wedding invitation goes viral - The Times of India
articles.description: Discover the unique and creative CSK-themed wedding invitation that has captured hearts on social media. This couple's love for Chennai Super Kings shines through in a playful and heartfelt design, creating a memorable celebration of their union.

articles.author: Firdose Moonda
articles.title: Crowd-funding campaign raises funds for new kit and tour payments for Vanuatu women - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Vanuatu women will become the first cricket team - male or female - from the country to play in a World Cup qualifier, in Abu Dhabi next week
articles.content: Vanuatu women's cricket gear is mostly all donated, either by companies or international players  •  Vanuatu Cricket Association

articles.author: Ashish Pant
articles.title: Sixy Ashutosh Sharma is making up for lost time - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: He missed four years of top-flight cricket after being dropped by MP but has reignited his career as a six-hitter in domestic cricket and IPL
articles.content: Match AnalysisHe missed four years of top-flight cricket after being dropped by MP but has reignited his career as a six-hitter in domestic cricket and IPL
